soc.server

Interface SOCBoardAtServer.NewBoardProgressListener

  • Enclosing class:
    SOCBoardAtServer

    public static interface SOCBoardAtServer.NewBoardProgressListener
    For layout testing, a listener to examine the new board's data at various steps of SOCBoardAtServer.makeNewBoard(SOCGameOptionSet).
    Steps in chronological order:
    • Place the hexes of each land area, or other set of hexes:

      These steps may occur multiple times per board because of multiple land areas/sets, and multiple times because layout may fail partway through and need to be restarted.

      hexesProgress(SOCBoardAtServer, SOCGameOptionSet, int, int[]) is called for these steps.

      • HEXES_PLACE
      • HEXES_CHECK_CLUMPS
      • HEXES_MOVE_FREQ_NUMS
      • After those steps, the hexes are added to SOCBoardLarge.getLandHexCoordsSet()
    • boardProgress(SOCBoardAtServer, SOCGameOptionSet, int) is called for the remaining steps:
    • ALL_HEXES_PLACED
    • FOG_HIDE_HEXES
    • DONE_PORTS_PLACED
    Listener is called only for SOCBoardLarge, not the original SOCBoard 4- or 6-player boards.
    See Also:
    SOCBoardAtServer.setNewBoardProgressListener(NewBoardProgressListener)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ALL_HEXES_PLACED
      All sets of hexes have been placed on the board.
      static int DONE_PORTS_PLACED
      Hex placement and port placement is finished.
      static int FOG_HIDE_HEXES
      Hex placement is finished.
      static int HEXES_CHECK_CLUMPS
      A set of hexes has been checked for clumps, after being placed on the board.
      static int HEXES_MOVE_FREQ_NUMS
      A set of hexes has been checked for adjacent frequent numbers.
      static int HEXES_PLACE
      A set of hexes has been placed on the board, but not yet checked for clumps.

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void boardProgress(SOCBoardAtServer board, SOCGameOptionSet opts, int step)
      A step of the overall board generation has completed.
      void hexesProgress(SOCBoardAtServer board, SOCGameOptionSet opts, int step, int[] landPath)
      A hex-placement step of the board generation has completed.

    • Field Detail

      • HEXES_PLACE

        static final int HEXES_PLACE
        A set of hexes has been placed on the board, but not yet checked for clumps.
        Next: HEXES_CHECK_CLUMPS
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HEXES_CHECK_CLUMPS

        static final int HEXES_CHECK_CLUMPS
        A set of hexes has been checked for clumps, after being placed on the board. Some hexes may have been swapped.
        Next: HEXES_MOVE_FREQ_NUMS
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HEXES_MOVE_FREQ_NUMS

        static final int HEXES_MOVE_FREQ_NUMS
        A set of hexes has been checked for adjacent frequent numbers. Some dice numbers may have been swapped.
        Next: ALL_HEXES_PLACED
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ALL_HEXES_PLACED

        static final int ALL_HEXES_PLACED
        All sets of hexes have been placed on the board.
        Next: FOG_HIDE_HEXES or DONE_PORTS_PLACED
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FOG_HIDE_HEXES

        static final int FOG_HIDE_HEXES
        Hex placement is finished. Because of game options, some hexes have been hidden behind fog.
        opts is null here, because opts isn't passed into fog-hex-hiding method.
        Next: DONE_PORTS_PLACED
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DONE_PORTS_PLACED

        static final int DONE_PORTS_PLACED
        Hex placement and port placement is finished. All steps are now complete.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • hexesProgress

        void hexesProgress(SOCBoardAtServer board,
                   SOCGameOptionSet opts,
                   int step,
                   int[] landPath)
        A hex-placement step of the board generation has completed. These steps may occur multiple times per board if layout has multiple areas being placed, and then occur multiple times because layout may fail partway through and need to be restarted.
        Parameters:
        board - The board being made
        opts - Game options passed to board constructor, or null if none
        step - HEXES_* generation step that's just completed; see SOCBoardAtServer.NewBoardProgressListener javadoc for list
        landPath - Coordinates of each hex that was placed or checked in this step

      • boardProgress

        void boardProgress(SOCBoardAtServer board,
                   SOCGameOptionSet opts,
                   int step)
        A step of the overall board generation has completed.
        Parameters:
        board - The board being made
        opts - Game options passed to board constructor, or null if none Also null for step FOG_HIDE_HEXES.
        step - Board generation step that's just completed; see SOCBoardAtServer.NewBoardProgressListener javadoc for list
